wordageddon.dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOSQLite

    public interface UserDAO
    UserDAO interface for managing user data in the database. Provides basic CRUD operations for User entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String fname,
             java.lang.String lname,
             java.lang.String password,
             java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
        Adds a new user to the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        fname - the first name of the user
        lname - the last name of the user
        password - the password of the user
        email - the email of the user
        isAdmin - whether the user is an admin

      • userExists

        boolean userExists(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if a user exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check
        Returns:
        true if the user exists, false otherwise

      • getUser

        User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Retrieves a user from the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        a User object if found, null otherwise

      • getUserByEmail

        User getUserByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Retrieves a user from the database by email.
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        a User object if found, null otherwise

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
        Retrieves all users from the database.
        Returns:
        a List of all User objects

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String fname,
                java.lang.String lname,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
        Updates the details of an existing user in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to update
        fname - the new first name of the user
        lname - the new last name of the user
        password - the new password of the user
        email - the new email of the user
        isAdmin - whether the user is an admin

      • updateUserAdminStatus

        void updateUserAdminStatus(int userId,
                           boolean isAdmin)
        Updates the admin status of a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user to update
        isAdmin - the new admin status

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
        Deletes a user from the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to delete
